title: Goin' All the Way!
overview: High schoolers Arnie and Monica split over his relentless pursuit of sex, only to find themselves drawn back together after a series of misadventures, awkward courtships, and the looming threat of jealous bully “Piggy” Bronk. Amid flirtations, fights, and fleeting romances, the teens navigate the chaos of youth, choosing between love and lust.
